description.text: You are skilled at grappling opponents.

sections.Benefit: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a grapple combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to grapple a foe. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense whenever an opponent tries to grapple you.
sections.Normal: You provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a grapple combat maneuver.
